title: Game freezing but ms in fine
body: My game keeps freezing while playing. almost as if I'm lagging but my ms is fine the entire match

replies.body: Hey, what did the log reader say?  Are you also running any third party apps or overlays?  Disabling them could help, as well as disabling the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Let me know!

You could upload some of your recent game logs that you were having issues in to the [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) and see what your issue might be - I'm thinking it could be packet loss.
i checked and it can look like it, is there a way to fix this? everything worked fine yesterday
